name: Mario Boss rush Nes Edition
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

  • movement - WASD
  • attack(if has powerup) - LEFT SHIFT, or MOUSE LEFT BUTTON
  • run - LEFT SHIFT,  or MOUSE LEFT BUTTON
  • jump - SPACEBAR, or MOUSE RIGHT BUTTON

Notes from the author:

  • This is an early alpha version, it was made from zero in 12 days, so it probably has some bugs.
  • I'm planning to remake some famous battles from NES games like Ninja Gaiden, castlevania,  batman(nes version), shatterhand, and other games, sometimes respecting the originality of the villains but adding some new behaviours for them. 
  • Please give feedback about this game, that's very important to me! And support it if you think it deserves of course = )
